title: Pixel 3 camera keeps shaking and stuttering when moving left or right.
content:
My Pixel 3 phone camera started shaking when I move it from right to left or vice versa. 
This is the exact same issue as some other posts.
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/2701270?hl=en-GB
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/9203821?hl=en-GB

Video:
https://photos.app.goo.gl/1cYGsXADZBbBtAcF8
